result.eng: She runs in the park every morning.
result.ga: bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.orig: Bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidin
result.html: bíonn sí ag rith sa pháirc gach maidinShe runs in the park every morning.
result.ponchtml: bíonn sí ag riṫ sa ṗáirc gaċ maidinShe runs in the park every morning.

result.eng: He sent the ball across the park.
result.ga: sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.orig: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.html: sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.
result.ponchtml: ẛeol sé an liaṫróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.

result.eng: There is a wall around the field.
result.ga: tá balla timpeall na páirce
result.html: tá balla timpeall na páirceThere is a wall around the field.
result.ponchtml: tá balla timpeall na páirceThere is a wall around the field.

result.eng: There is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ga: tá cluiche peile idir an spidéal agus an cheathrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.orig: Tá cluiche peile idir An Spidéal agus An Cheathrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.html: tá cluiche peile idir an spidéal agus an cheathrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ponchtml: tá cluiċe peile idir an spidéal agus an ċeaṫrú rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.orig: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.html: níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theachI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
